ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong locale in the admin tour
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 On the "Shipping manual" tour step we use wrong locale string Admin.ConfigurationSteps.ConfigureManual.FixedRateTitle instead of Admin.ConfigurationSteps.ConfigureManual.FixedRate.Title

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6814 Removed information about ShipStation plugin from the admin tour

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6815 Fixed typo on the locale in the admin tour
